description.en-US: Notification Email sent to the customer to tell them their order will have a refund after revision.
description.en-CA: Notification Email sent to the customer to tell them their order will have a refund after revision.
description.fr-CA: Courriel de notification envoyé au client pour l'aviser que sa commande aura un remboursement après sa révision.

content.en-CA: Your return request #{{Return.ReturnNumber}} for order #{{Return.OrderNumber}} is being reviewed for a refund
content.en-US: Your return request #{{Return.ReturnNumber}} for order #{{Return.OrderNumber}} is being reviewed for a refund
content.fr-CA: Votre requête de retour #{{Return.ReturnNumber}}  pour la commande  #{{Return.OrderNumber}} est en processus de révision pour un remboursement
